sections.body: Kiro, the mud shaman of a remote tribe, sees outsiders as a threat to his culture and people. He acquired a green dragonhide breastplate years ago from a trader, but keeps it hidden under cloaks and wraps, ashamed that he had to buy it rather than earn it through combat.
Kiro uses mud pits as traps to entangle his enemies.
A stubborn xenophobe, Kiro does not like speaking with those who are not of his tribe.
